title: Evaluate Postfix Expression
statement: Given a postfix expression (Reverse Polish Notation), evaluate it and return the result. Valid operators are +, -, *, /. Division should truncate toward zero.
input_format: A single line containing space-separated tokens (operands and operators).
output_format: Print the result of the expression.
constraints:
1 <= tokens <= 10^4
Operands are integers in range [-200, 200].
The expression is always valid.
